segments.text: For people with type 2 diabetes, consistent glucose monitoring helps evaluate treatment effectiveness.
Nutrition strategy should prioritize fiber, reduced refined carbohydrates, and stable meal timing.
Aerobic exercise improves insulin sensitivity, while resistance training supports metabolic health.
Medication adherence and periodic A1C tests are central components of long-term diabetes care.
Clinicians should review symptoms of hypoglycemia and instruct when to adjust doses safely.
